title: Senior Creative Front End Web Developer
description: Are you a seasoned Front End Web Developer with a flair for creativity? We are seeking a Senior Creative Front End Web Developer to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will blend your technical expertise with a keen eye for design to create visually stunning and highly functional web applications. Bring your experience in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to the forefront as you contribute to the evolution of our web presence
how_to_apply: If this describes your interests and experience, please submit your current resume and salary requirements through the following link: https://www.sweetrush.com/join-us/

company: MANDARIN MEDIEN Gesellschaft für digitale Lösungen mbH
title: Systemadministrator:in
description: Join our team as a System Administrator and play a crucial role in maintaining the stability and security of our IT infrastructure. As a System Administrator, you will manage servers, networks, and ensure seamless operations across our systems. If you have a passion for system optimization and troubleshooting, we invite you to apply and be a key player in our IT success story.

company: MANDARIN MEDIEN Gesellschaft für digitale Lösungen mbH
title: IT-System- und Netzwerkadministrator:in
description: Wir suchen eine:n erfahrene:n IT-System- und Netzwerkadministrator:in, die/der eine entscheidende Rolle bei der Pflege und Sicherheit unserer IT-Infrastruktur spielt. Als Administrator:in verwalten Sie Server und Netzwerke und gewährleisten den reibungslosen Betrieb unserer Systeme. Wenn Sie eine Leidenschaft für die Optimierung von Systemen und Troubleshooting haben, laden wir Sie ein, sich zu bewerben und eine Schlüsselrolle in unserer IT-Erfolgsgeschichte zu übernehmen.

company: MANDARIN MEDIEN Gesellschaft für digitale Lösungen mbH
title: Frontend Entwickler:in
description: Als Frontend Entwickler:in haben Sie die Möglichkeit, unsere digitalen Projekte mitzugestalten. Bringen Sie Ihr Know-how in HTML, CSS und JavaScript ein, um ansprechende und hochfunktionale Benutzeroberflächen zu entwickeln. Wenn Sie leidenschaftlich gerne an innovativen Webanwendungen arbeiten, könnten Sie die perfekte Ergänzung für unser Team sein.

title: Software Architect/Developer
description: Join our team as a Software Architect/Developer, where you will play a pivotal role in designing and developing scalable software solutions. If you have a passion for creating robust architectures and are proficient in coding, this role offers an exciting opportunity to contribute to cutting-edge projects and shape the technological landscape of our organization.
how_to_apply: If you are interested, please send your resume to Jobs@carregistration.com. CANDIDATES only, please.

title: Site Reliability Engineer / Systems Engineer (d/m/w)
description: Exciting opportunity in Cologne! We are looking for talented individuals to join our team in this vibrant city. Explore a career with us and be part of an innovative and dynamic work environment.

title: Cloud Platform Engineer (d/m/w)
description: Are you passionate about cloud technologies? Join us as a Cloud Platform Engineer and contribute to the design, deployment, and maintenance of our cloud infrastructure. This role offers the chance to work with cutting-edge technologies and shape the future of our cloud platforms.

title: Senior UX Engineer (m/w/d)
description: We are seeking a Senior UX Engineer to lead our user experience design initiatives. In this role, you will be responsible for creating intuitive and visually appealing interfaces that enhance user satisfaction. If you have a strong background in UX design and a passion for creating seamless user journeys, we want to hear from you

title: Flutter Developer
description: Do you have expertise in Flutter? Join us as a Flutter Developer and contribute to the development of cross-platform mobile applications. This role offers the opportunity to work on innovative projects and collaborate with a dynamic team of developers.

title: Java-Entwickler / DevOps Engineer (d/m/w)
description: Combine your Java development skills with DevOps expertise in this dual-role opportunity. As a Java-Entwickler / DevOps Engineer, you will contribute to both the development and operational aspects of our projects, ensuring a seamless integration of code and infrastructure.

title: Senior Android Developer (f/m/d) (80-100%)
description: We are seeking a Senior Android Developer to join our mobile development team. If you have a passion for creating cutting-edge Android applications and a strong background in mobile development, we invite you to apply and be a key player in shaping the future of our mobile solutions.

title: Architect IT Applications (m/w/d)
description: Join us as an Architect IT Applications and play a strategic role in designing and overseeing the implementation of IT applications. This role requires a combination of technical expertise and architectural vision to drive the evolution of our application landscape.

title: Software Engineer
description: We are hiring Software Engineers to join our innovative team. As a Software Engineer, you will be involved in the full software development lifecycle, contributing to the design, development, testing, and maintenance of our software solutions.

title: Web Developer
description: Are you a Web Developer with a passion for creating exceptional online experiences? Join our team and use your skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build engaging and user-friendly websites.

title: Junior Back End Developer
description: Kickstart your career as a Junior Back End Developer! In this role, you will work closely with experienced developers to contribute to the backend development of our applications. If you have a strong foundation in programming and a desire to grow your skills, we encourage you to apply.

To apply, please go to:

Scroll down to apply!

title: DevOps-Engineer (m/w/d) für virtualisierte CO-Simulationsumgebungen in der Automotive-IT
description: Als DevOps-Engineer für virtualisierte CO-Simulationsumgebungen in der Automotive-IT spielen Sie eine Schlüsselrolle bei der Integration von Software und Infrastruktur in unserer Entwicklungslandschaft. Wenn Sie Erfahrung in der Automotive-IT haben und die Herausforderung lieben, innovative Lösungen zu schaffen, freuen wir uns auf Ihre Bewerbung.

title: Entwicklungsingenieur (m/w/d) AUTOSAR
description: Als Entwicklungsingenieur für AUTOSAR tragen Sie dazu bei, die Zukunft der Automotive-IT zu gestalten. In dieser Rolle sind Sie verantwortlich für die Entwicklung und Implementierung von AUTOSAR-Lösungen. Wenn Sie eine Leidenschaft für Automotive-Technologien haben, sollten Sie sich bewerben.

title: Senior Software-Entwickler (m/w/d) Automotive-IT für CO-Simulationsumgebungen
description: Als Senior Software-Entwickler für Automotive-IT leisten Sie einen wesentlichen Beitrag zur Entwicklung von CO-Simulationsumgebungen. In dieser Position haben Sie die Möglichkeit, innovative Lösungen zu schaffen und die technologische Landschaft unserer Organisation zu prägen.
